name: michael.jackson
description:
#6 - streets of salvador

memory of michael jackson passage through salvador historical center, to record his videoclip "they don't care about us" in 1996. 

this passage is in the memory of many who lived through that time   

the dynamics of salvador the first capital of brazil, its architectural structures and its miscegenated people are portrayed in photos and videos from the perspective of those who were raised there. 

the blackest city outside africa, salvador is the portrait of all the inequality generated by a slave colony. 

salvador - bahia - brasil - 2015
